Services

Let us transform your sound-related questions into evidence-based action plans! We have experience in collaborative research projects with different funding agencies, but also industry contracts and we’re open to consulting opportunities.

We have a history of turning ideas into a concrete process with viable outcomes. So, whether you are a planning or design firm, an academic or health institution, a municipality, a non-governmental entity or a corporate setting, we can help you:

Articulate your sound-related needs and expectations, and integrating them into a broader plan for your products, services and spaces

Identify and strategize sound-related transformations

Facilitate communication between engineering and design professionals to articulate solutions and interventions

Identify and preserve “high quality” sound environments

Enhance the quality of experience through sound

Reinforce the sonic identity of heritage places

Getting a taste of the quiet we thought we wanted

Our projects rely on participatory approaches to the design of built environment and products, integrating different perspectives on sound from a wide range of stakeholders.  

  • Participatory research approaches with an “ear” for fairness and equity
  • For public space and ambiance
  • Balancing quantitative and qualitative insights
  • Developing research instruments and tools
  • Documenting and integrating insights from different stakeholders
  • Characterization of sound environments of e.g., “high quality”
